name: blackout (itch) (apaphy, shupershammy)
description:
gmtk 2021 submission!

the city has lost power during a nation-wide blackout. use your wifi-controlling robots to send signal to the routers in each building and spread wifi to the city!

made in unity by apaphy and shupershammy

CONTROLS:

  • wasd (or arrow keys) to move
  • e to switch players
  • q to lock/unlock laser
  • p to skip level

TOOLS USED:

  • Unity
  • Krita
  • Aseprite
  • Ibis Paint
  • Photoshop
  • Visual Studio
  • Garageband
